ml:created.ml:description:
This self-paced tutorial introduces you to MarkLogic Content Pump, a command line tool. By the end of this tutorial, you should be able to:
Describe the purpose and benefits of MarkLogic Content Pump
Set up MarkLogic Content Pump
Distinguish between local and distributed modes of operation
Use MarkLogic Content Pump to import, export, and copy MarkLogic database contents
